RTCDTMFSenderToneBuffer.summary:
The interface's toneBuffer property returns a string
containing a list of the DTMF tones currently queued for sending to the
remote peer over the . To place tones into the buffer,
call .

remarks.para: Tones are removed from the string as they're played, so only upcoming tones are listed.

RTCDTMFSenderToneBuffer.value:
A string listing the tones to be played. If the string is empty,
there are no tones pending.
